quote.text: You are allowed to be both a masterpiece and a work in progress at the same time.
quote.author: Sophia Bush

scripture.text: The Lord your God is with you, the Mighty Warrior who saves. He will take great delight in you; in His love He will no longer rebuke you, but will rejoice over you with singing.

message:
Ms Sunshine ☀️💗

You must know You are cared for by me...and by a God whose love never runs out.

Sometimes I look at you and I just want to say, What a special Girl...

And I mean that. You're not just someone passing through life... you are someone God handcrafted with purpose, softness, strength, and undeniable beauty.

You mean more to me than you may ever fully know. Your joy matters to me. Your peace matters to me. Your soul matters to me.

When I care, I care deeply and I care about you deeply... And I pray that you always feel that, especially on days when life gets Crazy.

God’s love for you is constant, even when your confidence isn’t. He delights in you. And me? I cherish you. Completely.

You're not alone in this world .

I’m always here for you.💗
